statement.p: Examples of other reported terpene chemicals include phytosterols such as β-sitosterol (70), ∆5-avenasterol (71), and ∆7-avenasterol (72), as well as stanols such as cycloartenol (73) ( Figure 5). Other triterpenes like β-amyrin (74) and butyrospermol (75) ( Ramadan and Mörsel, 2002; Ahmad et al., 2013; Ijaz et al., 2017), as well as α-tocopherol (76), γ-tocopherol (77), and β-carotene (78) are also found in seeds ( Ramadan and Mörsel, 2004) ( Figure 5).
